name: Data Governance, Retention, and PII PRD

sections.title: Overview
sections.content: Policies and controls for data classification, retention, and privacy (PII) to meet regulatory and customer requirements.

sections.title: Classification & Catalog
sections.content: Data classes (PII, sensitive, public); catalog coverage; lineage basics; owners and stewards.

sections.title: Retention & Deletion
sections.content: Service-level retention schedules; deletion workflows; backups handling; legal holds and exemptions.

sections.title: Privacy & DSRs
sections.content: Consent management; Data Subject Requests (export/delete); response SLAs; audit trails for requests.

sections.title: PII Redaction & Access
sections.content: Redaction/tokenization; role-based access; masked views for non-prod; secrets and encryption hygiene.
